All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ball
Represent a Ball, as taken from the input, the name of a player, and what ever goes after some space or tab.
BallResult
Represent the information of a ball, the pins knocked down and a flag that is true when the value is 0 and was a foul
BLog
 
BowlingController
 
BowlingGame
Represents the preprocessed input data, basically all the lines of the input

DataSourceFactory
 
EmptyDataSourceException
 
Frame
Representation of a Frame of a player, it contains between 1 and 3 elements BallResult when the game is complete.
FrameInfo
Encapsulates all the information necessary for a frame in order to build a ScoreBoard
